keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will continue to invest in health care and will fight to ensure Solihull Hospital offers a full range of services
A Labour Government will continue to invest in all our best future: ensuring they get the best possible education here in our city
I will fight to keep Land Rover jobs in Solihull while encouraging green technology companies to come here
Councils and developers often try to force unwelcome plans on local communities. I will stand up for what people here want
I will work with the local groups who support hard for our community and make the great British high places to live: making Solihull so attractive a place to live

issues.economy: I will fight to keep Land Rover jobs in Solihull while encouraging green technology companies to come here.
issues.education: A Labour Government will continue to invest in all our best future: ensuring they get the best possible education here in our city.
issues.health: Labour will continue to invest in health care and will fight to ensure Solihull Hospital offers a full range of services.

housing.content: Councils and developers often try to force unwelcome plans on local communities. I will stand up for what people here want

contactInformation.address: Freepost RRYG-XUYC-JJCZ Sarah Merrill 200 London Road Solihull B93 9HU

endorsements.endorsement: Access to medical services has improved enormously over the last 12 years and patients are being seen so much quicker now.

images.caption: Sarah Merrill - a fresh start for Solihull
Sarah listens to the views of local young people
